script:
1). Who's handling the McPherson account?
You can never count on it.
That would be Felicia Morgan. 
I don't know whose it is.
2). How often do we have staff retreats?
We had one last year.
We've had 15 retreats.
Usually twice a year. 
3). Does Joe Henry work in this office?
No, I'm afraid that he isn't.
Yes, he doesn't work here.
Let me see. Yes, he does.
